long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When activated this changes all text references to Trump into the words "Horses Ass".  
Make the internet for enjoyable. Works great with Facebook.  Changes Trump to "Horses Ass" ass you type you messages just incase you forget to do it yourself.
